exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("收藏夹", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token")) {
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("来源", null, 1);
providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>
variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日", 7: "日中", 8: "5+6", 9: "5+7"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。

修复目录乱序 通过源变量 输入"目录乱序"来开启变量
header: {'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; PFJM10 Build/TP1A.220905.001; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/132.0.6834.163 Mobile Safari/537.36"}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var Jsoup = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
var Elements = Packages.org.jsoup.select.Elements;
var document = Jsoup.parse(src);
var volMap = {};
var tabs = document.select(".buttons-tab a");
for (var i = 0; i < tabs.size(); i++) {
    var element = tabs.get(i);
    var text = element.text();
    var href = element.attr("href").substring(1);  
    volMap[href] = text;
}
var result = [];
var tabsDiv = document.select(".tabs .tab");
var z = source.getVariable(); // 获取用户变量
java.log(z)
for (var i = 0; i < tabsDiv.size(); i++) {
    var tab = tabsDiv.get(i);
    var tabId = tab.id();  
    var vol = volMap[tabId];  

    var items = tab.select("ul li .item-link");
    var tempItems = [];  

    for (var j = 0; j < items.size(); j++) {
        var item = items.get(j);
        var link = item.select("a").first();
        var text = link.text().trim();
        var href = link.attr("href");
        tempItems.push({ text: text, url: href, vol: vol });
    }

    // 根据变量z判断排序方式
    if (z == "目录乱序") {
        // 按数字升序排序
        tempItems.sort(function(a, b) {
            var numA = (a.text.match(/\d+/) || [0])[0];
            var numB = (b.text.match(/\d+/) || [0])[0];
            return parseInt(numA, 10) - parseInt(numB, 10);
        });
    } else {
        // 默认倒序
        tempItems.reverse();
    }

    result = result.concat(tempItems);
}

result;

</js>

bookSourceComment:
┍　　　说明　　　作者：洛娅橙　　┒
├────────────────┤
│①书源默认优化正文加载，可能会导│
│致下载书籍异常，在该登录界面点击│
│启用下载即可。　　　　　　　　　│
│②登录界面开启同步书架功能，在详│
│情页下拉刷新两次或书架刷新，会自│
│动同步至网站书架。　　　　　　　│
│③支持屏蔽书籍为黑名单，之后在搜│
│索和发现不再显示屏蔽后的书籍误点│
│时，可再次点击进行恢复。　　　　│
│④输出名单到日志需要在软件其它设│
│置里开启记录日志功能。　　　　　│
│⑤正则书名黑名单填写示例：　　　│
│　/母亲|第\d+部/　　　　　　　　　│
│⑥白名单填写示例：　/岳母|御姐/　 │
│同时符合黑名单与白名单的书籍正常│
│显示，与单独屏蔽功能独立。　　　│
│⑦网站选书：在书籍界面直接点击√│
│会自动跳转详情页。　　　　　　　│
│⑧封面字体颜色填写示例：　　　　│
│ＦＦＦＦＦＦ　或　００００００　│
├────────────────┤
│　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　│
│请使用阅读最新测试版导入该书源　│
└────────────────┘
┍　　　　书源作者：洛娅橙　　　　┒
├───┬────────────┤
│！免责│本书源只提供代码进行技术│
│！声明│交流，请于２４小时后删除│
├───┴────────────┤
│可在书源登录界面进行登录。　　　│
│搜索关键词输入示意：　　　　　　│
│“我的”、“书名：系统”、“作者│
│：棺材”、“标签：母女”。　　　│
│书籍变量可用来进行交互，详情查看│
│相应界面的变量说明　　　　　　　│
│　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　│
│❗❗❗如果你正在使用阅读正式版 │
│非常遗憾书源会进行报错，很多功能│
│在正式版无法支持实现。　　　　　│
└────────────────┘

//重定向和导入书架处理
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) {
	book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(baseUrl.replace(/,{o.+/,''))},{'type':''}`;
	}

//告诉目录是由详情来的
java.put('sx1',1);

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

//发书评功能
let bkbl = book.getVariable("custom");
//解书籍地址
let ml = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let bkid = (mlj.match(/book\/(\d+)/)||['',''])[1];
//↑获取书id
java.put('bkid',bkid);

if (bkbl=='🔒'||bkbl=='') {
//带🔒或书籍变量为空会经过这里
//处理加书架功能
let sj=java.get('sj');
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
if (sj=='2'&&sj2=='1') {java.put('sj',3);tbshujia(nn,bkid);}
else if (sj=='1') {java.put('sj',2);}

	}
else if (bkbl=='目录') {
	//清空最新章储存强制刷新目录
	java.put('8xzx','');
	//清空输入的书籍变量
	book.putCustomVariable('');}
else {
let pfurl = nn+'/modules/article/rating.php';
let plurl = nn+'/modules/article/reviews.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()||'';
let cki = ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''];
tk = cki[1];
//ck = cookie.getCookie(nn);
//↑获取链接和tk

if (bkid != '' && tk != '') {
let tm = new Date().getTime();
let bkfs = (bkbl.match(/^(\d|10)分$/) || ['','0'])[1];
let pfbody = `score=${bkfs}&id=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;
let plbody = `ptitle=&act=newpost&jieqi_token=${tk}&Submit=&pcontent=${bkbl}&aid=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;

let headers = {
        'User-Agent': ua,
        'x-requested-with': x_r_w,
        'sec-ch-ua-platform': s_c_u,
        'referer': mlj,
        'cookie': ck
    };
if (bkfs != 0) {url=pfurl;body=pfbody;}
else {url=plurl;body=plbody;}
//清空输入的书籍变量
book.putCustomVariable('');
let by = java.post(url,body,headers).body();
java.longToast("\n"+java.htmlFormat(by));
	} else if (tk == '') {java.toast('未登录');}
}

//随机延时0-1秒
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*1001);
//java.log('延时'+tim);
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);

//先发评论再访问刷新
if (!i) {
	let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
	//不能直接访问tt，result无法改动
	tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
	const startTime=new Date().getTime();
	result = java.ajax(nn+tt); //+",{'webView': true}"
	const endTime=new Date().getTime();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	if (speed>19) {java.toast('\n详情页访问延迟：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');}
	java.setContent(result);
	}

//内容判断
let r = java.getString('@@meta[name="keywords"]@content');
let name=String(r).replace(/\, .+/,'');
let author=String(r).replace(/.+\, /,'');

if (name) {
	book.name=String(book.name)||name;
	book.author=String(book.author)||author;
//放入书名
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
//放入ID和书名。正式版js语法报错点
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
	if (book.name!=name) {
			let sm=source.get('8xsm'),sm1=java.get('sm1');
			//sm功能标记，sm1判断标记
			if (sm1=='') {
			//可能源地址换新了，进行更新
			cache.put('8xbl1', source.getVariable() );
			source.setVariable('');
			java.put('sm1',1);
			} else if (sm=='1') {
				book.name=name;
				java.toast("已自动更新书名");
			} else if (sm1=='1') {
				java.longToast("详情页获取的书名：\n《"+name+"》");
				java.log("书名："+name);
				java.put('sm1',2);
			}
			
}	else if (book.author!=author) {java.log("获取的作者不同，作者："+author);} //仅输出日志
	
	//书名和作者正常由此过
	}
else {

}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let bin = book.durChapterIndex;
let cin = chapter.index;
let inn = cin - bin;
let dn = source.get('8xdn');
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn);
if ((inn==-4||inn==4)&&dn!=1) {java.longToast('\n使用下载需要在书源登录界面开启功能\n建议预下载设定不要大于3');}

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*501);
let ii = 1;
//*手动限制并发,下载时(0-50秒随机)

switch(inn) {
	case 0: break;
	case 1: sleep(1500+tim); break;
	case 2: sleep(4500+tim); break;
	case 3: sleep(7500+tim); break;
	case -1: sleep(3000+tim); break;
	case -2: dn==1 ? sleep(6000+tim) : ii=0;break;
	case -3: dn==1 ? sleep(9000+tim) : ii=0;break;
	default: dn==1 ? sleep(tim*100) : ii=0;break;
}

//延时结束
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn+'延时结束');
let bkid = java.get('bkid'); //两个putm用

if (inn==0||inn==1) {
//放入书名和id
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
}

let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,nn);
//java.log('正文地址：'+tt);
let ml = String(book.tocUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let ck0 = source.getLoginHeader();
let headers0 = {
        'user-agent': ua,
        'x-requested-with': x_r_w,
        'sec-ch-ua': s_c_u,
        'sec-ch-ua-platform': s_c_u_p,
        'referer': mlj,
        'cookie': ck0
    };

let getr;
if (ii) {
//↓第一次访问正文
try {
const startTime=new Date().getTime();
getr = java.get(tt,headers0);
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn+'访问结束');
const endTime=new Date().getTime();
//判断访问情况，错误时把响应内容清除
if (getr.statusCode() == 200) {
	result = getr.body();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	if (speed>19) java.toast('\n正文页访问延迟：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');
	} else {java.toast('\n正文链接响应码错误，inn='+inn);result='';}
//复原手机版链接，干掉字数统计
chapter.url = tt.replace('www.','');

//拦截超时报错
} catch (e) {if (/timeout/.test(e)) java.toast('正文超时');
java.log('🍊正文出错：'+e);}
// if ii 结束
	} else {result='';}
//inn>1时为空，软件会自动重新获取

let rr = java.getString('class.mt mb@a@text||class.tc mb@a@text',result);

//内容识别
if (rr.includes("登录") ) {
	java.toast("💎请重新登录书源账号");

variableComment:
♦源变量：
　 当前书源使用的网址
　 可点击发现页版本号手动刷新

♦书籍变量：
　 ①填写  🔒 并刷新，关闭本书评论显示
　 ②填写“目录”并刷新，强制刷新目录
　 ③填写分数并刷新，使用分数进行评分
　 ④填写其它并刷新，内容作为评论发送
分数格式示意“1分”“2分”…“10分”

㊟详情页检测到有更新内容时才刷新目录(书架刷新不影响)

！注意区分源变量和书籍变量

  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);

ruleContent.content:
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){ c = cookie.getKey("https://read.douban.com","dbcl2") cok = String(/\d+:/.test(c)?c.match(/(\d+):/)[1]:"anonymous"); t = java.getString("$.data"); script = ``; ddd = java.webView(script,baseUrl,"result"); //规范Json数据 // 定义正则表达式 const pattern = /:"(.*?)"([,\]\}])/g; // 替换逻辑 ddd = String(ddd).replace(pattern, (match, content,suffix) => { // 将内容中的双引号替换为转义字符 const replacedContent = content.replace(/"/g, '\\"'); // 返回替换后的结果 return `:"${replacedContent}"${suffix}`; }).replace(/\n/g,'\\n'); const data = JSON.parse(String(ddd)); function extractContent(item) { let paragraphText = ""; // 用于拼接同一个 paragraph 的 content const textList = item.data?.text || []; // 获取 text 数组 if (Array.isArray(textList)) { // 遍历 text 数组，提取 content textList.forEach(textItem => { if (textItem.content) { // 如果 content 是数组，进一步提取 if (Array.isArray(textItem.content)) { textItem.content.forEach(contentItem => { if (contentItem.content) { if (Array.isArray(contentItem.content)) { contentItem.content.forEach(cc => { paragraphText += cc.content; }); } else { paragraphText += contentItem.content; } } else if (typeof contentItem === "string") { paragraphText += contentItem; } }); } // 如果 content 是字符串，直接拼接 else if (typeof textItem.content === "string") { paragraphText += textItem.content; } } }); } else { paragraphText += textList; } return paragraphText; } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let isTargetChapter = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { // 如果已经找到目标章节，直接退出循环 if (isTargetChapter) break; // 检查是否是目标章节 if (chapterNumber === 0) { isTargetChapter = true; } else { chapterNumber--; } } else if (item.type === 'paragraph' && isTargetChapter) { // 如果是目标章节的段落，提取内容并添加到章节内容中 chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // 检查是否需要使用章节逻辑 if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // 遍历数据，提取并拼接 content data.forEach(item => { if (item.type === "paragraph") { // 筛选 type 为 paragraph 的对象 result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // 每个段落换行 } }); } // 打印最终的文章内容 }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `❗️刷新本章跳转加入书架界面❗️\n书名：${bookName}\n作者：${bookAuthor}\n\n简介：\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, 《${bookName}》加入书架

跳转加入书架

简介：${info}

`; java.startBrowser(script,"《"+bookName+"》") } } result

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){
aid = "{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/(\d+)/)[1]:"{{$.id}}";

id="{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/\d+\/toc\/(\d+)/)[1]:"";
url = "https://read.douban.com/j/article_v2/get_reader_data";
body = "aid="+aid;
result = url +","+ JSON.stringify({
	"method":"POST",
	"body":String(body),
	"headers":{
		"referer":"https://read.douban.com/reader/column/{{baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]}}/chapter/"+(id!=""?id:aid)+"/",
		"X-CSRF-TOKEN":java.get("X-CSRF-TOKEN")
		}
	});
	}else{
		
		result = java.getString("@tag.a.0@href")
		}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.introinfo.book.author
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{$.introinfo.book.lastChapterName##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{$.chapinfo.lastChapterUpdateTime##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: $.introinfo.book.title
